Articles.Content: Im excited for the modding, I can't wait to see what challenges we as a community will overcome in modding this new game. For example, updating kopernicus to ksp2, or even my mod, randomized systems.  I just cant wait to see the spectacular things we will do as a community.
The most exciting thing to me is the customization that will be possible such as coloring my ships and sizing wings and stuff exactly as I need! Fly brightly colored and Safe fellow Kerbonauts!!
I AM excited for multiplayer. Can't wait to crash with friends
im exited to get my house lit on fire from my gpu being ass

I haven't played KSP in a long while, but I am giddy with excitement at the prospect of starting all over again, with everything new and fresh.

At first, I want to build some planes, and put those procedural wings to use. Explore the new Kerbin a bit. Crash into those new bridges.
Excited to create a new space station in LKO!
Excited for the new mods!
I'm super excited for colony building

Kerbal Space Program.. 12 years old when it was first playable and I remember it like it was yesterday, how passionate I was about this game and how much it fueled my desire to observe the sky and d travel there..

The opportunity to win a key gives me a huge smile, I've been waiting for the game since it was announced, almost four years!

I hope the team will see this message; I want to say thank you for creating and setting up this sequel, for enduring the challenges and difficulties so far and for offering us, in the short and long term, the joy of playing the sequel to one of the games the most important of my life

With all my affection for the game, your work and your determination, a big hello from Belgium.

CybraxPunker.

PS: I'm just excited to be able to launch the game for the first time to rediscover the emotion of 12 years ago.

Edited February 23, 2023 by cybraxpunker

I'm ecstatic about the improvement of orbital mechanics and how they affect space crafts at further distances. Most of all I'm excited about an already amazing game being improved upon and how I essentially feel like a kid in the candy store contemplating all of the possibilities.

If by some miracle I win this it will honestly be the most exciting thing that has happened to me in quite a while. I've never been more emersed in a game other than the original, with all of the add ons. Long live Kerbal 

Edited February 23, 2023 by jamesQ
There were just more things I couldn't help but add lol
im really excited to see the beauty of the space, and the creations.
Probably important, I assume the winners get to pick the platform they recieve the game on, right?
Im excited for the even better mods we will get
Give me a key! I am top3 KSP streamer in my region
I'm excited for new planets outside the kerbol system!
On launch day, I’m excited for procedural wings and color customization. After that, I’m looking forward to colonies and multiplayer
Honestly excited for the interstellar stuff....still a long way off, but its something that I think will be absolutely amazing when it comes out in due time.

I want to see how my computer burned out from the minimum requirements.

 

Excited for the new textures!
I'm excited for the procedural wings and improved environment on kerbin.
I would love to extended the interstellar experience in KSP2

I’m excited for this so I can finally get my husband to be quiet. It’s all he ever talks about. Ever since we got together he has talked about this game. He’s obsessed with the first one and can do some amazing things on there. He would be so happy his birthday is in April so it would be a early bday present!  So help me help him!!! PLEASE!
I'm excited for KSP2 because it's the closest experience I'll ever have to visit another planet, to mine asteroids, to see the starlight dawn over an alien horizon
Although everyone else is probably saying this, oh my god I am so excited for colonies. The amount of new posibilities this opens up is endless. I CANT WAIT!!!
I think the best part of the game is the new engines. Their introduction can help with real ship designs.
I am very excited for the new tutorials, as I am a new ksp player, and want to learn more about how orbital mechanics work. I am also excited for interstellar so I get more to explore and discover!
